entry.tran: 目光短浅的;缺乏远见的
entry.def: If you describe someone as myopic, you are critical of them because they seem unable to realize that their actions might have negative consequences.

example.ex: The Government still has a myopic attitude to spending.
example.tran: 政府在开支问题上仍然目光短浅。

entry.def: If someone is myopic, they are unable to see things which are far away from them.

means.word_mean: 1. unable to see distant objects clearly
